text: Gerbstedt is a little town at the Mansfeld-SÃ¼dharz rural district, Saxony- Anhalt in Germany. It is north of Eisleben. The little river Lobach flows through it. Gerbstedt is about northwest of Halle, Saxony-Anhalt. It was first mentioned in 985 as Gerbizstidi. In the area of Gerbstedt, there is copper schist. It has been mined since 1730. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Towns in Saxony-Anhalt
title: Gerbstedt
